settings.text:
Give your under-eye an extra boost with our weekly deep treatments formulated and shaped for the delicate under-eye. Enhance the appearance of your under-eye area with our specialized weekly deep treatments that are specially formulated for the delicate under-eye skin.

Plump fine lines + Ramp up radiance + Brighten dark circles

settings.title: INTENSE, DEEP DELIVERY
settings.text: Perfectly shaped for the under-eye contour, 830 ultra-fine MicroCrystal tips gently and painlessly deliver concentrated active ingredients directly where needed – in the skins deeper layers.

settings.title: SMOOTHER, FIRMER SKIN
settings.text: Each MicroCrystal tip is formed with an anti-ageing blend to soften fine lines after a few applications, with continued improvement over time.

settings.title: BRIGHTEN DARK CIRCLES
settings.text: A skin-restoring blend to even out skin tone and brighten tired eyes and dark circles.

settings.heading: Key Components
settings.row_content:
Hyaluronic Acid is a natural substance found in the body that helps keep skin hydrated, lubricated, and youthful. It helps retain moisture and provides a cushioning effect for the skin, making it look plump and smooth. Used in a variety of skincare products, hyaluronic acid helps reduce wrinkles, fine lines, and dryness.

Peptides are a powerful ingredient in skin care products as they help to stimulate collagen production, which is essential for firm-looking skin. We have chosen three key peptides to help reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles: Acetyl Hexapeptide-8 These peptides are scientifically proven to help improve the texture of your skin, reduce wrinkles and give you a more youthful look.

settings.heading: How To Use
settings.row_content:
Applying to clean, dry skin, press each MicroMask onto the skin firmly (press, do not rub). Ensure the centre of the MicroMask is fully pressed to activate the crystal tips.

Leave on for at least 2 hours, ideally overnight, allowing the MicroCrystals to fully dissolve and release the actives deep into the skin where they can be most effective.

settings.heading: What To Expect
settings.row_content:
Weeks 1-2
Use: 2 Applications per week
Hyaluronic Acid holds onto moisture like a sponge for soft, supple skin. You may notice that your skin looks and feels smoother, with a more youthful and radiant appearance

Weeks 3 To 6
Use: 1-2 Applications per week
Over time, retinal and peptides smooth and firm crow’s feet expression lines and eyes appear brighter and wide awake.

Week 6 Onwards
Use: Weekly deep treatments as part of your regular skincare routine
Committing to weekly deep treatments will help keep crow’s feet at bay.

settings.heading: Full Ingredients
settings.row_content: Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic acid), Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer-2, Niacinamide, Adenosine, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8

settings.heading: Description
settings.row_content:
Crow De-Creaser is our Brand New weekly treatment that Supercharges Your Anti-Aging. Each outer-eye MicroMask™️ is covered in hundreds of tiny crystal tips, formulated from a blend of powerful active ingredients. 

On application, the tips bypass the skin’s outer layer and dissolve - Drenching The Dermal Layers In Powerful Retinal, Hyaluronic Acid And Collagen-Boosting Peptides for an intense anti-ageing impact on your crow’s feet

settings.heading: Revive, refresh, and visibly de-puff tired-looking eyes* with our cooling hydrogel patches.
